alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Northwest Beaverhead County; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 19 at 2:30PM MDT until March 21 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO 6 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 5 inches for valleys, and between 7 and 11 inches for mountains. * WHERE...The Mountains of Southwestern Montana south of Interstate 90, and Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft. * WHEN...From 6 AM Monday to 6 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult and tire chains may be required for some vehicles. Those in the backcountry should ensure they are prepared for dangerous conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website. To see a graphical representation of the degree of stress on young livestock please visit our webpage and select Local Programs then Cold Air Advisory for Newborn Livestock.
